page.title: 14TRADE
page.content: The larger new parade has sixteen shops,with parking outside.The Motor Factors is quite large but the others are quite small. The Iron Mongers sells garden equipment and is busy at the weekend. There are two restaurants, one Indian and the other Chinese. The florists sells flowers and plants from the local nursery. The wool shop sells some clothes, and there is a new ladies clothes shop. There is a bank, an estate agency and a staff agency. A bicycle shop has just opened. They sell BMX bicycles. The small grocers is busy, but the most popular shop is the fish and chip shop, people come from all over the area to buy their fish and chips.
